entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pond Inlet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -40.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pond Inlet Airport 09:33 AM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -40.9°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -51
Dewpoint: -45.3°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 36.
